description: Add only attribute for the journey builder request.

Journeys_BuilderObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journeys_BuilderObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journeys_BuilderObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Builder_Data.description: The unique reference ID to the journey builder.

Journey_Category__All_Object.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journey_Category__All_ObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journey_Category__All_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Builder_Data.description: The journey category reference ID or the Workday ID for the journey builder.

validation.validation: Submit a valid journey category. This category isn't valid: [JourneyCategory].
The journey category can't be changed. You must use this category: [PersistedCategory].

Journey_Builder_Data.description: The description field within the journey builder.

Journey_Builder_Item_Data.description: The reference ID for the builder item, including thebuilder itemattributes.
The placement order of the step group within the journey.

Journeys_Step_GroupObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Journeys_Step_GroupObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Journeys_Step_GroupObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Builder_Item_Data.description: The reference for the step group.

validation.validation: The step group must match the category: [Category].
The Journey Builder must have unique Step Groups.

Condition_RuleObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Condition_RuleObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Condition_RuleObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Journey_Builder_Item_Data.description: The reference for thecondition rule of the step group.

Journey_Builder_Data.description: The data within a journey builder item instance.

validation.validation: Builder Item order must be unique. [itemOrder]

description: The data within a journey builder instance.

validation.validation: The Journey Builder must have 1 or more Step Groups.
The Journey Builder must have less than or equal to [max] Step Groups.
Specify a name for the journey builder that hasn't already been used for this journey category.
